研究人员探讨了亚太地区的幽门螺杆菌治疗政策幽门螺杆菌细菌被认为是胃癌的主要原因，亚太地区的感染率尤为高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/researchers-ecplore-h-pylori-wareatment-policies-policies-in-the-asia-asia-pacific-gregion.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/researchers-ecplore-h-pylori-wareatment-policies-policies-in-the-asia-asia-pacific-gregion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b3cc993-fb72-4f61-4f61-8f5e-0820a5f03b7d Wed, 19 Mar 2025 02:21:00 -0400 Researchers explore H. pylori treatment policies in the Asia-Pacific region
UCLA健康发现模仿小鼠中风康复作用的药物加州大学洛杉矶分校（UCLA Health）的一项新研究发现了研究人员所说的是第一种完全重现模型小鼠中风康复作用的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/ucla-health-discovers-drug-thatmimics-sstroke-rehabilitation-effects-effects-in-saspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/ucla-health-discovers-drug-that-mimics-sstroke-rehabilitation-effects-effects-in-saspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4A6DA6E6-41F8-4C95-8830-4FE664C3862B Wed, 19 Mar 2025 02:11:15 -0400 UCLA Health discovers drug that mimics stroke rehabilitation effects in mice
了解CD2AP在阿尔茨海默氏病中的作用一位经过开创性的同行评审思想领袖邀请了脑医学的评论文章（基因组出版社，纽约）探讨了CD2相关蛋白（CD2AP）如何促进阿尔茨海默氏病（AD），这是全球影响数百万次影响数百万人的最毁灭性神经退行性疾病之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/understanding-the-the-the-the-the--role-of-cd2ap-in-alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/understanding-the-the-the-the--cd2ap-in-cd2ap-in-alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64982587-e912-4ff5-4ff5-ae61-9c520433adebf Wed, 19 Mar 2025 02:01:53 -0400 Understanding the role of CD2AP in Alzheimer's disease

新的RNA条形码方法跟踪微生物群落中的基因转移在细菌的微观世界中，基因转移是一种强大的机制，可以改变细胞功能，驱动抗生素抗性，甚至塑造整个生态系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/new-rna-barcoding-method-tracks-gene-tracks-gene-tracks-gene-transfer-in-microbial-communities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/new-rna-barcoding-method-method-tracks-gene-tracks-gene-trancfer-in-microbial-communities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=Abaf2CE6-D69E-42FE-8F86-F41DE65F6EB2 Wed, 19 Mar 2025 01:31:20 -0400 New RNA barcoding method tracks gene transfer in microbial communities
BMI可能不再足以评估老年人的肥胖症体重指数（BMI）是测量一个人体重状况的关键方法，并定义它们的体重正常，超重或肥胖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/bmi-mi-may-no-no-longer-be-enough-be-enough-for-sassessing-sassessing-obesity-inger-nolder-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/bmi-mi-may-no-no-longer-be-enough-be-enough-for-sassessing--sessessing-obesity-inger-inder-----------comments.comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc59ce64-B5DF-46A5-46A5-80F3-7DC6A4D7B607 Wed, 19 Mar 2025 01:20:48 -0400 BMI may no longer be enough for assessing obesity in older adults
研究人员挑战癌症的遗传范例研究人员在3月18日发表的一篇新文章PLOS生物学上发表的一篇新文章中，研究人员的遗传疾病重新考虑当前的癌症范式是遗传疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/researchers-challenge-challenge-the-genetic-paradigm-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250319/Researchers-challenge-challenge-the-genetic-paradigm-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00BDA955BFDB-4C11-93F0-DB2FDC205871 Wed, 19 Mar 2025 01:17:42 -0400 Researchers challenge the genetic paradigm of cancer
Tiktok影响者促进周期同步，但是证据在哪里？研究人员分析了100个有关月经周期同步的Tiktok顶级视频，发现最缺乏科学信誉，只有4％的研究引用研究，30％提供了创作者的证书。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/tiktok-influencers-promote-cycle-syncing-but-where-where28099s-the-vidence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/tiktok-influencers-promote-cycle-cycle-syncing-but-where-where28099s-the-vidence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02f1b823-f8b5-4ba9-b4b2-aff29d4ccf1a Tue, 18 Mar 2025 23:20:00 -0400 TikTok influencers promote cycle syncing, but where’s the evidence?
研究发现非手术治疗对背痛的有效性有限仅十分之一的普通非手术和非侵入性治疗下背部疼痛是有效的，这表明对可用研究的汇总数据分析，该研究在线发表在BMJ基于BMJ的基于BMJ的医学上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/study-finds-limited-finds-limited-surgical-non-surgical-wartments-for-back-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/study-finds-limited-finds-limited-surgical-non-surgical-wartments-for-back-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbbad7f9-da02-4dad-a480-7e052093f6b9 Tue, 18 Mar 2025 22:55:46 -0400 Study finds limited effectiveness of non-surgical treatments for back pain
与降低耳鸣风险有关的水果，纤维，乳制品和咖啡因的摄入量增加水果，饮食纤维，乳制品和咖啡因的消费量增加可能与耳鸣的风险降低有关（耳朵响起），这表明对可用证据的分析，发表在开放式证据中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/increased-intake-of-fruit-fruit-fiber-dairy-and-and-caffeine-ind-link-------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250318/increased-intake-fruit-fruit-fiber-dairy-and-and-caffeine-ind-link------------------to-lower-to-lower-tinnitus-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5b4f2b1-85db-411a-a9a2-5501fcc850cf Tue, 18 Mar 2025 22:52:09 -0400 Increased intake of fruit, fiber, dairy and caffeine linked to lower tinnitus risk
